scripts.build:framework: npm run build -w @broccoliapps/shared && npm run build -w @broccoliapps/backend -w @broccoliapps/frontend -w @broccoliapps/infra -w @broccoliapps/dev-tools -w @broccoliapps/browser
scripts.dotcom: npm run build:framework && npm run dev -w @broccoliapps/dotcom
scripts.nwm:backend: npm run build:framework && npm run dev -w @broccoliapps/nwm-backend
scripts.deploy:dotcom: npm run build:framework && npm run deploy -w @broccoliapps/dotcom
scripts.deploy:nwm: npm run build:framework && npm run deploy -w @broccoliapps/nwm-backend
